def_cn: 轻事重报的；危言耸听的；杞人忧天的
def_en: Someone or something that is alarmist causes unnecessary fear or anxiety that something unpleasant or dangerous is going to happen.

def_cn: 轻事重报的人；危言耸听的人；杞人忧天的人
def_en: An alarmist is someone who causes unnecessary fear or anxiety that something unpleasant or dangerous might happen.
